::KitKat::

She watched him sit down next to her. She couldn't believe what he 
just said. "You think I'm beautiful?" She wondered if she was still 
dreaming. "I..I don't know what to say."  She felt her face blush and 
turn a deep red. She looked at him."I....I....I,"

> ::DrillBit::

every
> morning." He waited a tryed to think of something flatering.
> "I don't know why you're surprized. After all, you're so beutiful." 
He
> said, sitting down next to her.
